handoff_context.summary: Comprehensive analysis on winter travel in Karelia completed.
handoff_context.context_for_next: Focus on creating engaging content to promote winter activities.
recommendations: Include visuals of winter sports and landscapes.
Integrate traditional Russian cuisine elements into promotions.
priority_items: Select key winter events to promote.
Collaborate with local resorts for package deals.
potential_issues: Monitor competing destinations for pricing changes.
success_criteria: Engagement metrics from email campaigns over the winter season.
User feedback on content and offers.
